name: ActiveWIT
tag_list: paas, saas, workflow, web-forms, tracking, auditing
overview:
ActiveWIT is a Platform as a Service to define, manage and host Custom Software as a Service.

ActiveWIT’s platform provides services that allow business people to define, manage and host applciations. The applications may contain workflow, web forms and even provide web services without writing code. The managment portion of the environment allows administrators to start or stop work items and reassign users. There is complete reporting of status and history combined with a detailed case history when of the history records are drilled into. The consumers are given an Inbox to select and work their task. Tasks can be started from the work item manager or from a link that’s placed within another application. The WIT within ActiveWIT stands for Web Integrated Technology. It’s free to try for 3 months and there’s no obligation. We want you to try it and tell your friends. We have plenty of documentation and videos and will be gald to help you with anything we can.
